location_short_descr: The unique museum documents the earliest history of the settlement of Moravia and the entire European continent...
location_long_descr: The unique museum documents the earliest history of the settlement of Moravia and the entire European continent. The 3.5 m high life-size model of a mammoth, accompanied by a cub, attracts considerable attention of both children and adults. The extensive museum exhibition is one of the largest and most modern of its kind in Europe.
